forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 23C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
